context.flawed_solution:
#### 18
The bass weigh 6 * 2 = <<6*2=12>>12 pounds in all.
The salmon weigh 2 * 12 = <<2*12=24>>24 pounds in all.
The trout, bass, and salmon together weigh 12 + 24 = <<12+24=36>>36 pounds.
Each camper will eat 2 pounds of fish, so Patricia and Jeffrey can feed 36 / 2 = <<36/2=18>>18 campers.
